Text:
please stop with bad image hosts and finding lame ways to get around the block ( like you evaded your first sharepic host block).

This is simple warning, if you keep up with this you will soon find your account banned with all your torrents removed.

if you want a image host then there are plenty clean ones.

http://bayimg.com/

http://imgbox.com/

http://imgur.com/

Thank You
